snippet: Afghan Kabob Fusion is a family halal restaurant featuring enticing aush soup and savory bolani turnovers, and the owner’s mother cooks the small menu.
abstract: Karla Cook reviews Afghan Kabob Fusion restaurant in Franklin Park (Metropolitan/New Jersey).
lead_paragraph: Afghan Kabob Fusion is a family halal restaurant featuring enticing aush soup and savory bolani turnovers, and the owner’s mother cooks the small menu.
